title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4113.4 - Return of declaration fee
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4113.4 - Return of declaration fee

State Regulations

If a horse has been declared to any stake or early
closing events in which it is unable to compete because of being placed on the
steward's list, the declaration fees paid thereon shall be refunded by the
sponsor programming the event. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4113.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
